title: Pair of sandals
description: Pair of sandals; made of wood with high pieces under heel and two to rise feet about 5 inches above floor.  Covered with silver? which has been pressed into a mould to give repousse effect.  The designs are conventionalized floal and geomtric and cover the entire surface, also the leather strap over the instep.  Around the sole are two rows of tiny silver bells; around heel and two three rows; on top of band over instep is a small boss of silver.
